com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d

Class AnimatedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics2d.AnimatedSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class AnimatedSprite
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    An extension of the LibGDX Sprite class with a built-in animation system.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AtlasAnimation> ANIMATIONS
      Stores a set of previously used AtlasAnimation, each referenced by calling their 'name' as a String.
      private float animationTime
      Controls the internal animation time used to check the duration of the animation playing and calculate the current frame to display.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas ATLAS
      Stores the selected atlas file for use.
      private AtlasAnimation currentAnimation
      A reference to the current animation that is playing.
      private float FRAME_DELAY
      Stores the amount of time each frame will be displayed.
      private static java.lang.String LOG_TAG 
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode PLAY_MODE
      Stores the 'loop type' of the animation.

      Creates an AnimatedSprite object by providing the properties of the animation and the position of the sprite.

    • Field Detail

      • LOG_TAG

        private static final java.lang.String LOG_TAG

      • ATLAS

        private final com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas ATLAS
        Stores the selected atlas file for use.

      • animationTime

        private float animationTime
        Controls the internal animation time used to check the duration of the animation playing and calculate the current frame to display.

      • FRAME_DELAY

        private final float FRAME_DELAY
        Stores the amount of time each frame will be displayed.

      • PLAY_MODE

        private final com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode PLAY_MODE
        Stores the 'loop type' of the animation.

      • ANIMATIONS

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AtlasAnimation> ANIMATIONS
        Stores a set of previously used AtlasAnimation, each referenced by calling their 'name' as a String. This is specifically used to avoid having to create a new reference to a file or from an AssetManager.

      • currentAnimation

        private AtlasAnimation currentAnimation
        A reference to the current animation that is playing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                      java.lang.String baseAnimation,
                      float frameDelay,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode)
        Creates an AnimatedSprite object by only providing the properties of the animation.
        Parameters:
        atlas - The texture atlas file for all animations.
        baseAnimation - The name of the 'base' or initial region of animations to play, taken from the provided atlas file.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                      java.lang.String baseAnimation,
                      float frameDelay,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode,
                      float x,
                      float y)
        Creates an AnimatedSprite object by providing the properties of the animation and the position of the sprite.
        Parameters:
        atlas - The texture atlas file for all animations.
        baseAnimation - The name of the 'base' or initial region of animations to play, taken from the provided atlas file.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.
        x - The initial X-position of the sprite.
        y - The initial Y-position of the sprite.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the animation timer, sprite flipping direction, and region of the sprite to the current animation frame.

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
        Updates and renders the sprite to the provided SpriteBatch.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - The batch to which the sprite will be rendered/drawn to.

      • updateAndRender

        public void updateAndRender(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
        Updates and renders the sprite to the provided SpriteBatch.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - The batch to which the sprite will be rendered/drawn to.

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name)
        Adds the provided atlas animation region based on its name to ANIMATIONS. The animation created uses FRAME_DELAY and PLAY_MODE.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the atlas region that will supply the current animation.

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                         float frameDelay,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode)
        Adds the provided atlas animation region based on its name to ANIMATIONS. The animation created uses the provided frame delay and play mode.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the atlas region that will supply the current animation.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                         AtlasAnimation animation)
        Adds the provided AtlasAnimation into ANIMATIONS.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation that will go into ANIMATIONS.
        animation - The animation that will be added along with the provided name.

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(java.lang.String animation)
        Changes the currentAnimation to the animation with the name provided. Adds the animation to ANIMATIONS if the animation was not previously used.
        Parameters:
        animation - The name of the atlas region that will supply the current animation.

      • setFrameDelay

        public void setFrameDelay(java.lang.String animation,
                          float frameDelay)
        Changes the frame delay of the provided animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The name of the atlas region that will be altered.
        frameDelay - The amount of time each frame will be displayed.

      • setPlayMode

        public void setPlayMode(java.lang.String animation,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode playMode)
        Changes the play mode of the provided animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The name of the atlas region that will be altered.
        playMode - The 'loop type' of the animation.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes all textures provided to the AnimatedSprite from memory. Should be called if the object is no longer in use and textures are not a part of an AssetManager.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
